scripts.install-client: npm i --prefix ./client/kitsune-wrapper && npm i --prefix ./client/kitsune-wrapper-extensions npm i --prefix ./client/kitsune-application-test-dummy
scripts.client-link-lib: npm run linklib --prefix ./client/kitsune-wrapper && npm run linklib --prefix ./client/kitsune-wrapper-extensions && npm run linklib --prefix ./client/kitsune-application-test-dummy
scripts.build-client: npm run build --prefix ./client/kitsune-wrapper && npm run build --prefix ./client/kitsune-wrapper-extensions && npm run build --prefix ./client/kitsune-application-test-dummy
scripts.install-server: npm i --prefix ./server/kitsune-ws-server && npm i --prefix ./server/kitsune-asset-store npm i --prefix ./server/kitsune-rest-server && npm i --prefix ./server/kserver
scripts.server-link-lib: npm run linklib --prefix ./server/kitsune-asset-store && npm run linklib --prefix ./server/kitsune-ws-server && npm run linklib --prefix ./server/kitsune-rest-server && npm run linklib --prefix ./server/kserver
scripts.build-server: npm run build --prefix ./server/kitsune-rest-server && npm run build --prefix ./server/kitsune-ws-server && npm run build --prefix ./server/kitsune-asset-store && npm run build --prefix ./server/kserver
scripts.stop: pkill --signal SIGINT kasset-store && pkill --signal SIGINT kws-server && pkill --signal SIGINT krest-server && pkill --signal SIGINT kserver && pkill --signal SIGINT kwrapper
